response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer is not just any item; it holds immense value and potential for growth, which I believe aligns perfectly with your interests and needs. Given its significance, we are extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $900,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a discount, considering its intrinsic worth to you is $1,000,000. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 900000}
